Config.EnableCategories.Name: Enable Power Categories
Config.EnableCategories.Description: If disabled, no categories will be added to the Special Items & Powers tab and it will look like it normally does. You will still benefit from any mods using the behind-the-scenes features in Special Power Utilities.
Config.ParseModNames.Name: Parse Mod Names
Config.ParseModNames.Description: Whether or not to attempt to parse mod names from the power IDs if the mod does not specifically add support for Special Power Utilities. If disabled, powers without SPU support will be placed in the misc. "Mods" category.
Config.EnableMiscCategory.Name: Enable Misc. "Mods" Category
Config.EnableMiscCategory.Description: Whether or not to enable the misc. "Mods" category for powers that do not have a specific category. If disabled, powers without a specific category will be placed with the vanilla Stardew Valley powers.
Config.UseVanillaMenu.Name: Use Vanilla Menu
Config.UseVanillaMenu.Description: Whether or not to use the vanilla menu for the Special Items & Powers tab. If enabled, the custom menu from Special Power Utilities will not be used. You will not see categories and any powers marked unavailable by mod authors will not be visible to you. However, any effects will still be applied.
Config.StripelessBooks.Name: Stripeless Books
Config.StripelessBooks.Description: Whether or not to remove the two stripes from the books in the animation that plays when you read a book.
